Name: Mustache or Revenge
About the game: Our Hero finds himself in dangerous dungeon welcoming him with a threat – fiend who wants to steal his mustaches. To save his pride our Hero needs to pass through dangerous traps and not get fooled by “Stealer of Mustaches”. - Do not let fiend steal your mustaches! - Feel classic traps in a new way, their finesse might surprise you! - Do you need to trust tips signs give you? - 8-bit drive soundtrack. - Magical amulet wouldn’t let you rest in peace.
